    • Uses of Message in fr.sii.ogham.core.condition.fluent

      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.core.condition.fluent that return types with arguments of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.$(Condition<Message> condition)
      Parenthesis operator to handle priorities: $(requiredProperty(propertyResolver, "mail.host").or(requiredProperty(propertyResolver, "mail.smtp.host"))) .and(requiredProperty(propertyResolver, "mail.port").or(requiredProperty(propertyResolver, "mail.smtp.port"))) Meaning "(mail.host is defined OR mail.smtp.host is defined) AND (mail.port is defined OR mail.smtp.port is defined)".
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.alwaysFalse()
      A condition that always returns false.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.alwaysTrue()
      A condition that always returns true.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.and(Condition<Message>... conditions)
      And operator between the provided conditions: and(requiredClass("javax.mail.Transport"), requiredClass("foo.Bar")); Means that the result will be true only if javax.mail.Transport and foo.Bar classes are present in the classpath.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.and(List<Condition<Message>> conditions)
      And operator between the provided conditions.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.not(Condition<Message> condition)
      Not operator to reverse provided condition: not(requiredClass("javax.mail.Transport)); Means that the result will be true if the class javax.mail.Transport is not present in the classpath.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.or(Condition<Message>... conditions)
      Or operator between the provided conditions: or(requiredClass("javax.mail.Transport"), requiredClass("foo.Bar")); Means that the result will be true if either javax.mail.Transport or foo.Bar class is present in the classpath.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.or(List<Condition<Message>> conditions)
      Or operator between the provided conditions.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.requiredClass(String className)
      Check if a class is present in the classpath.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.requiredProperty(PropertyResolver propertyResolver, String property)
      Check if a property is present in the configuration properties.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.requiredPropertyValue(PropertyResolver propertyResolver, String property, Pattern pattern)
      Check if a property value matches the pattern in the configuration properties.
      static FluentCondition<Message> MessageConditions.requiredPropertyValue(PropertyResolver propertyResolver, String property, String value)
      Check if a property has a particular value in the configuration properties.

    • Uses of Message in fr.sii.ogham.email.message

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.email.message that implement Message 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Email
      Email message that contains the following information: The subject of the mail The body of the mail (see Content and sub classes for more information) The sender address The list of recipient addresses with the type (to, cc, bcc) The list of attachments to join to the mail
